extendedIngredients.name: beets
extendedIngredients.original: After arranging the beets, top with the pecans, cilantro and cheese. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle lightly with sea salt and black pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Summer Roasted Beet Salad
summary: Summer Roasted Beet Salad might be just the side dish you are searching for. One serving contains 484 calories, 13g of protein, and 23g of fat. For $3.82 per serving, this recipe covers 29% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. A mixture of summer roasted beet salad, pecans, beets, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. This recipe from Tokyo Terrace has 6 fans. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. It will be a hit at your The Fourth Of July event. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 89%. This score is excellent. Try Roasted Beet and Blueberry Salad to embrace the end of summer, Roasted Beet and Shallot Salad over Wilted Beet Greens and Arugula, and Summer Beet Side Salad for similar recipes.
